name: load
doc: Loads specified symbols from an external .bzl file into the current BUILD file. This function allows importing functions, rules, and other symbols defined in Starlark extension files.

params.name: ext_file_label
params.doc: Label reference to the .bzl file containing the symbols to import (e.g. "@repo//path/to/file.bzl")

params.name: *targets
params.doc: Variable number of symbol names to import directly from the extension file. Each symbol will be imported using its original name.

params.name: **aliased_targets
params.doc: Symbol imports with aliases specified as keyword arguments. The key is the local alias name and the value is the original symbol name in the extension file.
